title: To Be A Lesbian
description: ASIN B01M8LURH5 moved to the most recent edition hereScotland Roth is a winner in life. She has the looks, the money, and the brain, which was why she thought things could never go wrong in her perfect little world. A mysterious woman is about to change all that. Can Scotland still keep her winning streak if she's losing in the game of love?
author: Yuriko Hime
